completed_tasks.title: Update n8n MCP Server API Client
completed_tasks.description: Update the MCP server to support n8n fork REST API v1 endpoints including workflows, executions, credentials, users, and projects management

completed_tasks.title: Add unit tests for resource monitoring utilities
completed_tasks.description: Create unit tests for ResourceMonitor class and related utility functions
success_criteria: Unit tests for ResourceMonitor class methods
Mock system resources for consistent testing

completed_tasks.title: Implement n8n Authentication Support
completed_tasks.description: Add support for multiple authentication mechanisms: API keys (X-N8N-API-KEY), OAuth 2.0, session-based auth, and enterprise SSO (SAML/OIDC)

completed_tasks.title: Create MCP-to-n8n Node Conversion System
completed_tasks.description: Build utilities to automatically convert MCP server capabilities and tools into n8n node definitions with proper parameter mapping and execution context
success_criteria: MCP server tool definition parser implemented
Parameter mapping system with type conversion
Execution context bridging between MCP and n8n
Unit tests with >80% coverage for conversion utilities
